sentences.en: A little moonlighting cash really can a million.
sentences.cn: 零星资金都有可能积累成百万财富.

sentences.en: He's been moonlighting for the past year as a driver.
sentences.cn: 过去一年里他下班后开车赚外快.

sentences.en: Sarah: Bruce Willis of the hit TV series - Moonlighting?
sentences.cn: 萨拉: 演热门电视连续剧“蓝色月光侦探社”的布鲁斯·威利斯?

sentences.en: Victor : I will have to start moonlighting to make both ends meet.
sentences.cn: 我得要开始兼差才能让收支平衡些.

trans.tran_cn: 月光( moonlight的现在分词 )，（通常为躲债而）潜逃，月光下的活动，参与夜袭的人
